thread.title: Disney's Live-Action Lion King Is Bringing Back One Of Its Best Stars
thread.title_full: Disney's Live-Action Lion King Is Bringing Back One Of Its Best Stars

title: Disney's Live-Action Lion King Is Bringing Back One Of Its Best Stars
text:
By Adam Holmes 17 minutes ago 
The casting process for the upcoming Lion King remake has begun! Earlier today, director Jon Favreau revealed that Donald Glover will voice the adult Simba in Disney's "live action" re-telling of their hit 1994 movie. Mere minutes later, now it's been announced that James Earl Jones will be back to voice Mufasa. Looking forward to working with this legend. #Mufasa pic.twitter.com/1LszbWrcYT â€” Jon Favreau (@Jon_Favreau) February 18, 2017 
Taking to his Twitter page once more, Jon Favreau announced to the masses that James Earl Jones will be back in the animal kingdom as Musfasa. Along with Donald Glover, he is the second actor to be added to The Lion King remake. I'm sure I speak for everyone when I say it's good to have Mr. Jones back in one of his best roles ever. 
More to come... Subscribe To Topics You're Interested In close
